subsection.name: Stage Tag
subsection.p: A component type may declare a dependency on an arbitary number of lifecycle stages. Each stage corresponds to a lifecycle extension that will be applied to the component in the order corresponding to the ordering of stage tags. A container is responsible for the construction and deployment of an extension stage handler (refered to as an extension) capable of servicing the stage dependency.
